fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Energy, Taxation, External Relations
eu_initiatives: Member of the EUJTPF. Participation as Transfer Pricing Expert in providing assistance to the EU Commission to simplify TP legislation.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: The goal of our Organisation is to contribute in the discussion within the EU for building up better relationship and simplify the legislation for Large - Medium and small Business entities.
relevant_communication: Participation to the Forum for the issuance of papers on TP simplification. Currently discussin about the REPORT ON THE USE OF COMPARABLES IN THE EU.
